languages.text: "Рано или поздно я превращу его плоть в источник сладкого знания. А до того он убьет еще десяток-другой гладиаторов на арене".

traits.locale_text: "Рано или поздно я превращу его плоть в источник сладкого знания. А до того он убьет еще десяток-другой гладиаторов на арене".

languages.text: "Sooner or later, I will turn his flesh into a fount of sweet knowledge. Until then, he will contribute by killing another dozen gladiators in the arena. Perhaps even two dozen."
languages.original_text: "Рано или поздно я превращу его плоть в источник сладкого знания. А до того он убьет еще десяток-другой гладиаторов на арене".

traits.locale_text: "Sooner or later, I will turn his flesh into a font of sweet knowledge. Until then, he will contribute by killing another dozen or two dozen gladiators in the arena."
"Sooner or later, I will turn his flesh into a font of sweet knowledge. Until then, he will contribute by killing another dozen or two dozen gladiators in the arena."
"Sooner or later, I will turn his flesh into a fount of sweet knowledge. Until then, he will contribute by killing another dozen gladiators in the arena. Perhaps even two dozen."
"Sooner or later, I will turn his flesh into a fount of sweet knowledge. Until then, he will contribute by killing another dozen gladiators in the arena. Perhaps even two dozen."
"Sooner or later, I will turn his flesh into a fount of sweet knowledge. Until then, he will contribute by killing another dozen gladiators in the arena. Perhaps even two dozen."
"Sooner or later, I will turn his flesh into a fount of sweet knowledge. Until then, he will contribute by killing another dozen gladiators in the arena. Perhaps even two dozen."

languages.text: « Un jour ou l'autre, je percerai tous les délicieux secrets de sa chair. Mais en attendant, il se rendra utile en massacrant une dizaine de gladiateurs supplémentaire dans l'arène. Ou une vingtaine, qui sait. »
languages.original_text: "Sooner or later, I will turn his flesh into a fount of sweet knowledge. Until then, he will contribute by killing another dozen gladiators in the arena. Perhaps even two dozen."

traits.locale_text: « Un jour ou l'autre, je percerai tous les délicieux secrets de sa chair. Mais en attendant, il se rendra utile en massacrant une dizaine de gladiateurs supplémentaire dans l'arène. Ou une vingtaine, qui sait. »

languages.text: “他的肉体迟早会变成我甜美的知识源泉。在那之前，他还可以在竞技场里再杀上十几个角斗士，说不定能杀二十几个。”
languages.original_text: "Sooner or later, I will turn his flesh into a fount of sweet knowledge. Until then, he will contribute by killing another dozen gladiators in the arena. Perhaps even two dozen."

traits.locale_text: “他的肉体迟早会变成我甜美的知识源泉。在那之前，他还可以在竞技场里再杀上十几个角斗士，说不定能杀二十几个。”

languages.text: "Früher oder später werde ich sein Fleisch in einen Quell des süßen Wissens verwandeln. Bis dahin wird er weiter seinen Beitrag leisten, indem er noch ein weiteres Dutzend Gladiatoren in der Arena tötet. Vielleicht sogar zwei Dutzend."
languages.original_text: "Sooner or later, I will turn his flesh into a fount of sweet knowledge. Until then, he will contribute by killing another dozen gladiators in the arena. Perhaps even two dozen."

traits.locale_text: "Früher oder später werde ich sein Fleisch in einen Quell des süßen Wissens verwandeln. Bis dahin wird er weiter seinen Beitrag leisten, indem er noch ein weiteres Dutzend Gladiatoren in der Arena tötet. Vielleicht sogar zwei Dutzend."

languages.text: «Tarde o temprano, convertiré su cuerpo en una aprovechable fuente de conocimiento. Mientras tanto, seguiré utilizándolo para eliminar a otra docena de gladiadores en la arena. Puede que hasta sean dos».
languages.original_text: "Sooner or later, I will turn his flesh into a fount of sweet knowledge. Until then, he will contribute by killing another dozen gladiators in the arena. Perhaps even two dozen."

traits.locale_text: «Tarde o temprano, convertiré su cuerpo en una aprovechable fuente de conocimiento. Mientras tanto, seguiré utilizándolo para eliminar a otra docena de gladiadores en la arena. Puede que hasta sean dos».

languages.text: 「遅かれ早かれ、私は彼の肉を甘い知識の泉に変えるだろう。それまで闘技場でまた数十人ほどの剣闘士を殺してくれるだろう。20人くらい行けるかもな」
languages.original_text: "Sooner or later, I will turn his flesh into a fount of sweet knowledge. Until then, he will contribute by killing another dozen gladiators in the arena. Perhaps even two dozen."

traits.locale_text: 「遅かれ早かれ、私は彼の肉を甘い知識の泉に変えるだろう。それまで闘技場でまた数十人ほどの剣闘士を殺してくれるだろう。20人くらい行けるかもな」

languages.text: "Bedenini er ya da geç bir bilgi membasına dönüştüreceğim. O zamana kadar arenaya herhâlde bir on gladyatör daha öldürerek katkı yapar. Yirmi belki."
languages.original_text: "Sooner or later, I will turn his flesh into a fount of sweet knowledge. Until then, he will contribute by killing another dozen gladiators in the arena. Perhaps even two dozen."

traits.locale_text: "Bedenini er ya da geç bir bilgi membasına dönüştüreceğim. O zamana kadar arenaya herhâlde bir on gladyatör daha öldürerek katkı yapar. Yirmi belki."
